scripts.watch: npm run link-packages && lerna run --parallel watch
scripts.link-packages: cd packages/layouts && yarn link && cd ../lib && yarn link && yarn link pro-layouts && cd ../gallery && yarn link && yarn link pro-layouts && yarn link pro-gallery-lib && cd ../playground && yarn link pro-gallery && yarn link pro-gallery-lib && cd ../ssr-simulator && yarn link pro-gallery && cd ../..
scripts.build-packages-by-order: cd packages/layouts && npm run build && cd ../lib && npm run build && cd ../gallery && npm run build && cd ../playground && npm run build && cd ../ssr-simulator && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-all-and-start-playground: npm run link-packages && npm run build-packages-by-order && npm run start-playground
scripts.build-all-and-start-ssr-simulator: npm run link-packages && npm run build-packages-by-order && npm run start-ssr-simulator
scripts.build:dev: npm run link-packages && npm run build-packages-by-order
scripts.test: npm run link-packages && npm run build-packages-by-order && lerna run --parallel test
scripts.ci:run-playground: cd packages/playground && npx serve -s build -l 3000 && cd ../..
scripts.ci:run-ssr: cd packages/ssr-simulator && npm run watch && cd ../..
scripts.ci:test-unit: npm run link-packages && lerna run --parallel test
scripts.ci:test-e2e-layouts: npm run link-packages && start-server-and-test ci:run-playground http-get://localhost:3000 'lerna run test:e2e-layouts'
scripts.ci:test-e2e-styleParams: npm run link-packages && start-server-and-test ci:run-playground http-get://localhost:3000 'lerna run test:e2e-styleParams'
scripts.ci:test-e2e-integration: npm run link-packages && start-server-and-test ci:run-playground http-get://localhost:3000 'lerna run test:e2e-integration'
scripts.ci:test-e2e-ssr: npm run link-packages && start-server-and-test ci:run-ssr http-get://localhost:3001 'lerna run test:e2e-ssr'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.patch: npm run lint && npm run test:all && node scripts/releaseVersion --patch
scripts.minor: npm run lint && npm run test:all && node scripts/releaseVersion --minor
scripts.major: npm run lint && npm run test:all && node scripts/releaseVersion --major
